    | timestamp = 01:01:19.840
    | text      = and this is really frustrating to me.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:24.079

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:30.400
    | text      = But from Alex, I just don't appreciate it.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:32.159

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = so much more sincerely angry.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:36.880

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Well, perhaps.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:39.119

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:50.239
    | text      = I mean the intent behind it is not, it's not humor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:53.440

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:09.679

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Right.

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:24.719
    | text      = But while he's taking some calls,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:26.800
    | text      = they end up talking about how he went to Piers Morgan

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:33.440
    | text      = And then afterwards, Alex got talked about on Piers Morgan's show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:39.360

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = threatened to kill Alex.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:43.360

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:45.599

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:50.880
    | text      = And Alex starts talking about this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:52.960

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:54.880
    | text      = realizes that he forgot to confront Piers Morgan
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:57.519
    | text      = about a murder threat, which I didn't even realize.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:00.639
    | text      = But that's a big problem.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:02.639

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:05.440
    | text      = Buzz Bissinger and Piers Morgan and others.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:08.159
    | text      = I should have brought up to Morgan,

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:09.199

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:10.400

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:18.320

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = God.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:21.760

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Yeah.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:29.199
    | text      = I agree with you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:30.159
    | text      = You should have.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:30.960
    | text      = I think so.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Right.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
